Serialized Form

  • Package visuals

    • Class visuals.Frame

      class Frame extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • game
          ChaosGame game
          The game state.
        • paused
          boolean paused
          Whether the auto mode of the game is currently paused. In auto mode, the game steps are performed FPS times SPS per second.
          See Also:
          • Frame.FPS
          • Frame.spf
        • spf
          int spf
          The game steps per frame. To get the number of game steps per second, multiply FPS and SPF.
          See Also:
          • FPS â€“ Frames per second.
        • stage
          Frame.Stage stage
          The panel in which the painting is performed.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage

    • Class visuals.Frame.Stage

      class Stage extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • CHART_HEIGHT
          int CHART_HEIGHT
        • CHART_WIDTH
          int CHART_WIDTH
        • currentFps
          int currentFps
          Current frames per second rate, calculated in paintComponent(Graphics).
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.lastFpsUpdate
        • dotSize
          int dotSize
        • helpMenu
          CenteredTextBox helpMenu
          The help menu.
          See Also:
          • CenteredTextBox
        • lastFpsUpdate
          long lastFpsUpdate
          The last time currentFps has been updated.
          Caution. The FPS number is not calculated for every frame in order to avoid rapid fluctuations, which is why lastFpsUpdate may differ from lastUpdate.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.currentFps
          • Frame.Stage.lastUpdate
        • lastUpdate
          long lastUpdate
          The last time paintComponent(Graphics) has been called in epoch milliseconds.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.lastFpsUpdate
        • MARGIN
          int MARGIN
        • movementVelocity
          float movementVelocity
          The velocity in pixels per second at which the observer can vary viewOffsetX or viewOffsetY.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.viewOffsetX
          • Frame.Stage.viewOffsetY
          • Frame.Stage.zoomVelocity
        • NODE_SIZE
          int NODE_SIZE
        • showConnectingLine
          boolean showConnectingLine
          Whether to show the line connecting the pre-latest dot with the latest node. (Revealing the distance which is divided to calculate the next dot position.)
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.showConnectingLine
        • showUI
          boolean showUI
          Whether to show UI components.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.showConnectingLine
        • viewOffsetX
          float viewOffsetX
          The offset of the viewer relative to the window center.
        • viewOffsetY
          float viewOffsetY
          The offset of the viewer relative to the window center.
        • zoomFactor
          float zoomFactor
          The zoom factor is multiplied with dot positions to achieve zooming.
        • zoomVelocity
          float zoomVelocity
          The velocity in "zoom factor" per second at which the observer can vary zoomFactor.
          See Also:
          • Frame.Stage.zoomFactor
          • Frame.Stage.movementVelocity
